meanings.definition: Attach (something) to a surface using a thumbtack.
meanings.sent1: She was thumbtacking her drawing to the bulletin board.
meanings.sent2: I will be thumbtacking the notice on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought thumbtacking the toy mouse was a fun game.
meanings.sent4: His words were like thumbtacking my heart with each syllable.
meanings.sent5: Thumbtacking the map made it easier to follow our route.

meanings.definition: The act of securing something to a surface using a thumbtack.
meanings.sent1: The thumbtacking of the poster was done carefully.
meanings.sent2: I found the thumbtacking of the flyer quite helpful.
meanings.sent3: The thumbtacking of the painting seemed like a tiny victory.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the gentle thumbtacking of happiness to my day.
meanings.sent5: The thumbtacking of the note caught my attention immediately.
